typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		USAF as string,
		WBAN as string,
		{STATION NAME} as string,
		CTRY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ICAO as string,
		LAT as double,
		LON as double,
		{ELEV(M)} as double,
		BEGIN as date,
		END as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StationInputdata
